page.title: 02Health Care in Droitwich
page.content: Medical services in Droitwich are centred on the town's Health Centre in Ombersley Street.The centre contains three group practices staffed by eleven doctors.One other N.H.S.doctor has a surgery in a house on Worcester Road and there are five dental practices in town. In 1984, a registered charity, St.Richard's Hospice at home was formed in Droitwich to care for the terminally ill in the familiar surroundings of their own homes.The hospice operates within the Worcester and District Health Authority and this year,while maintaining strong links with Droitwich,it moved its headquarters to Worcester. Providing this care currently costs around Â£50000 a year.
